org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution

Class SphericalMultivariateGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution.AbstractMultivariateGaussian
      • org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution.SphericalMultivariateGaussian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultivariateDistribution, MultivariateGaussian

    public class SphericalMultivariateGaussian
extends AbstractMultivariateGaussian
    Implementation of a spherical MultivariateGaussian (diagonal covariance matrix with equal values).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        public Jama.Matrix getCovariance()

        Get the covariance

      • getCovariance

        public double getCovariance(int row,
                            int col)
        Description copied from interface: MultivariateGaussian
        Get a covariance value from the covariance matrix.

        This method is provided for efficiency as not all implementations will store the full matrix, and it would be wasteful to create it each time a value is needed.

        Parameters:
        row - the row of the matrix value to get
        col - the column of the matrix value to get
        Returns:
        the covariance at the given row and column
